title: Tea Caddy
dimensions: H x diam.: 8.8 x 7 cm (3 7/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
description: Ovoid form with blunt shoulders and abbreviated neck, flat base and slightly flared lip.  Deep brown and black glaze dripped over yellow brown glaze which comes to base.  Iridescense over areas of glazing.  Some orange at lip and inside mouth.  Parts of interior glazed.  b) Cover: yellow silk with green embroidery, lined with plain silk.  Paper on inside base.  Silk cords for drawstrings.
